channel.title: I can't verify Patrick Schleizer's OpenPGP key in The OpenPGP Web of Trust.
channel.description:
I follewed this. https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Signing_Key#Web_of_Trust
I imported Jan Dittberner's key from debian-keyring. And I checked signatures on Patrick's key. But the result was like this.
pub rsa4096/0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2014-01-16 [SC] [expires: 2026-01-23] Key fingerprint = 916B 8D99 C38E AF5E 8ADC 7A2A 8D66 066A 2EEA CCDA uid [ unknown] Patrick Schleizer <adrelanos@riseup.net> sig!3 0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2020-01-25 Patrick Schleizer <adrelanos@riseup.net> sub rsa4096/0x10FDAC53119B3FD6 2014-01-16 [A] [expires: 2026-01-23] sig! 0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2020-01-25 Patrick Schleizer <adrelanos@riseup.net> sub rsa4096/0xCB8D50BB77BB3C48 2014-01-16 [S] [expires: 2026-01-23] sig! 0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2020-01-25 Patrick Schleizer <adrelanos@riseup.net> sub rsa4096/0x3B1E6942CE998547 2014-01-16 [E] [expires: 2026-01-23] sig! 0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2020-01-25 Patrick Schleizer <adrelanos@riseup.net>
gpg: 4 good signatures
What should I do?

item.title: I can't verify Patrick Schleizer's OpenPGP key in The OpenPGP Web of Trust.
item.dc:creator: USO
item.description:
I follewed this.

Whonix – 10 Mar 20

Download the Whonix ™ Signing Key

Get Whonix ™ OpenPGP signing key. Verify Whonix ™ Downloads and/or Source Code.

I imported Jan Dittberner’s key from debian-keyring.
And I checked signatures on Patrick’s key.
But the result was like this.

pub rsa4096/0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2014-01-16 [SC] [expires: 2026-01-23]
Key fingerprint = 916B 8D99 C38E AF5E 8ADC 7A2A 8D66 066A 2EEA CCDA
uid [ unknown] Patrick Schleizer adrelanos@riseup.net
sig!3 0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2020-01-25 Patrick Schleizer adrelanos@riseup.net
sub rsa4096/0x10FDAC53119B3FD6 2014-01-16 [A] [expires: 2026-01-23]
sig! 0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2020-01-25 Patrick Schleizer adrelanos@riseup.net
sub rsa4096/0xCB8D50BB77BB3C48 2014-01-16 [S] [expires: 2026-01-23]
sig! 0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2020-01-25 Patrick Schleizer adrelanos@riseup.net
sub rsa4096/0x3B1E6942CE998547 2014-01-16 [E] [expires: 2026-01-23]
sig! 0x8D66066A2EEACCDA 2020-01-25 Patrick Schleizer adrelanos@riseup.net

gpg: 4 good signatures

What should I do?

Read full topic
item.source: I can't verify Patrick Schleizer's OpenPGP key in The OpenPGP Web of Trust.
